forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High near 5C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 41F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low near 0C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 31F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.
